Prepare operating space.sentence: The surgical team clears the operating room of any unnecessary equipment and supplies.
Prepare operating space.subject: The surgical team

Prepare operating space.sentence: The nurse verifies that all necessary surgical instruments are sterile and within reach.
Prepare operating space.subject: The nurse

Prepare operating space.sentence: The anesthesiologist prepares the anesthesia equipment and checks for proper functionality.
Prepare operating space.subject: The anesthesiologist

Prepare operating space.sentence: The surgical team sets up the operating table according to the surgical protocol.
Prepare operating space.subject: The surgical team

Prepare operating space.sentence: The team conducts a final safety check to ensure all equipment is ready and correctly positioned.
Prepare operating space.subject: The team
